## ArgSerializer.valuesToString() method

Serializes a set of typed values into an arguments string (e.g. aa<!-- -->@<!-- -->bb<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->cc).

**Signature:**

```typescript

        argumentsString: string;
        count: number;
    };
```
